title: Tom E. Curran explains why Josh McDaniels is the perfect fit, outlines FA approach | WEEI Afternoons
text:
Tom E. Curran explains why Josh McDaniels is the perfect fit, outlines FA approach | WEEI Afternoons
The hierarchy of the new #patriots regime is set. How should fans feel about the coaching staff and key decision-makers? Tom E. Curran joined Andy Hart, Nick 'Fitzy' Stevens, and Ted Johnson to break it all down. Plus, what can we expect from both the offense and defense?
